forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 64F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 64F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 64F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 63F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High near 20C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 67F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.
